# The `ThreadingPath` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/threadingpath">ThreadingPath</a> is a path in the control flow of a loop that can be threaded by cloning necessary basic blocks and replacing conditional branches with unconditional ones. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dfajumpthreading-cpp-/threadingpath">ThreadingPath</a> is a path in the control flow of a loop that can be threaded by cloning necessary basic blocks and replacing conditional branches with unconditional ones.

A threading path includes a list of basic blocks, the exit state, and the block that determines the next state.

Definition at line 384 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/dfajumpthreading-cpp">DFAJumpThreading.cpp</a>.
